attributes.action: Commission a revised logo for the 2012 Olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the initial public reaction to the abstract design which has recently been unveiled, we feel that the logo should be reviewed, and that the design should reflect the integrity of this country, and of the Olympic movement.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
